title.rendered: India vs Sri Lanka, 3rd ODI, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Mohammed Shami, who has not been at his best in this series could be replaced.

India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Mohammed Shami/Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Umran Malik, Mohammed Siraj

Sri Lanka: Nuwanidu Fernando, Avishka Fernando/Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis (wk), Charith Asalanka, Dhananjaya de Silva, Dasun Shanaka (c), Wanindu Hasaranga, Chamika Karunaratne, Dunith Wellalage, Lahiru Kumara, Kasun Rajitha

Venue: Greenfield International Stadium, Thiruvananthapuram

Pitch Report

Only one match has been played at this venue. When India took on the West Indies in 2018, the visitors were bowled out for 104.

The pitch is expected to remain on the slower side. Dew is also expected to make its presence felt.

Weather: Clear

Wins

Batting first: —

Batting second: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Rohit Sharma has already collected 100 runs for the series. When he last batted at the Greenfield International Stadium, he scored 63* off 56 (5 fours and 4 sixes).

Kuldeep Yadav and Mohammed Siraj each bagged a three-for in the previous game and were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Mohammed Shami has taken only one wicket at 6.43 RPO in his last 3 ODIs.

For India, Umran Malik, KL Rahul, and Siraj have been a part of the Ultimate Team in both matches.

For Sri Lanka, only Kasun Rajitha has made the Ultimate Team on both occasions.

It is quite striking to discover that both sides have been pretty even in terms of boundary-hitting. While India have smashed 74, Sri Lanka have whacked 73.

By picking 23 wickets, seamers from both sides have generated more points in this series as compared to the spinners, who have taken only 6.
